name: 1BRsh
description:
1BRsh is a game crated by Joaquin "Lakso" Laks and Bruno Aronskid.

Even tho This wasn't our first Jam, it was our first together, so we did run into some problems, but we finally finished it.

Programming by Lakso.

Assets by Bruno.

Royalty free music "High octave" downloaded from Bensound.com

Sfx made with Sfxr
